quotes.message: The longer a man's fame is likely to last, the longer it will be in coming.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: People confuse fame with validation or love. But fame is not the reward. The reward is getting fulfillment out of doing the thing you love.
quotes.name: Claire Danes

quotes.message: Fame is like a shaved pig with a greased tail, and it is only after it has slipped through the hands of some thousands, that some fellow, by mere chance, holds on to it!
quotes.name: Davy Crockett

quotes.message: Fame is hollow. It amplifies what is there. If there is any self-doubt, or hatred, or lack of ability to connect with people, fame will magnify it.
quotes.name: Alanis Morissette

quotes.message: If you wanna be famous, then it's okay if the music is fake, because fame isn't real.
quotes.name: Josh Homme

quotes.message: With fame, you can't trust everybody. You can't depend on them being there for you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got and what you can bring to their life. It's not a relationship-it's a leech.
quotes.name: Chris Brown

quotes.message: Passion for fame: A passion which is the instinct of all great souls.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: The present condition of fame is merely fashion.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Fame can take interesting men and thrust mediocrity upon them.
quotes.name: David Bowie

quotes.message: If you're lucky enough to be famous, then it's great if you can use your fame and the power your fame gives you to draw attention to things that really matter.
quotes.name: Michael Schumacher

quotes.message: One of the downsides of being famous is that folks pay far more attention to you than they should. American celebrities are constantly under surveillance, and every word they say is subject to scrutiny. So, be careful what you wish for if you desire fame. No human being should be a goldfish.
quotes.name: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.message: Worldly fame is but a breath of wind that blows now this way, and now that, and changes name as it changes direction.
quotes.name: Dante Alighieri

quotes.message: Fame is a vapor; popularity an accident; riches take wings; the only earthly certainty is oblivion.
quotes.name: Horace Greeley

quotes.message: Fame is the thirst of youth.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: For children preserve the fame of a man after his death.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Fame is indeed beautiful and benign and gentle and satisfying, but happiness is something at once tender and brilliant beyond all things.
quotes.name: Mary MacLane

quotes.message: There's a funny thing about fame. The truth is you run as fast as you can towards it because it's everything you want. Not just the fame but what it represents, meaning work, meaning opportunity. And then you get there, and it's shocking how immediately you become enveloped in this world that is incredibly restricting.
quotes.name: George Clooney

quotes.message: Fame or perceived success - it all comes from groupthink.
quotes.name: Chance The Rapper

quotes.message: Fame is something that is bestowed upon you because of success. Success is something you have to chase.
quotes.name: Noel Gallagher

quotes.message: Fame is like a big piece of meringue - it's beautiful, and you keep eating it, but it doesn't really fill you up.
quotes.name: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.message: Fame itself... doesn't really afford you anything more than a good seat in a restaurant.
quotes.name: David Bowie

quotes.message: You can't reverse fame. You can lose all the money, but you'll never lose people knowing you.
quotes.name: J. Cole

quotes.message: If we should be blessed by some great reward, such as fame or fortune, it's the fruit of a seed planted by us in the past.
quotes.name: Bodhidharma

quotes.message: In general, when you have success on the field, you're more popular, and you have that fame that comes with it. You realize you're in the public eye more, and you've got to be a little bit more careful about some of the things you're doing out in public and make sure you're smart about the things you say.
quotes.name: Aaron Rodgers

quotes.message: Fame has also this great drawback, that if we pursue it, we must direct our lives so as to please the fancy of men.
quotes.name: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.message: Is fame without purpose and is fame without talent really where we are now? People used to be famous for what they did. Now, they're just famous.
quotes.name: John Carroll Lynch

quotes.message: Fame can be just so annoying because people are so critical of you. You can't just say, 'hi'. You say hi and people whisper' man did you see the way she said hi? What an attitude.
quotes.name: Juliette Lewis

quotes.message: Of all the possessions of this life fame is the noblest; when the body has sunk into the dust the great name still lives.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: The highest form of vanity is love of fame.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: Fame is damaging when people become reliant on it for their sense of self, and their identity, when fame is linked to how you see yourself.
quotes.name: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.message: Fame is a weird one. You need to distance yourself from it. People see a value in you that you don't see yourself.
quotes.name: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.message: Love of fame is the last thing even learned men can bear to be parted from.
quotes.name: Publius Cornelius Tacitus

quotes.message: If you come to fame not understanding who you are, it will define who you are.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Never underestimate the power of being popular in pop culture. You have to be able to do something. You can have a good seat at the restaurant, but you still have to pay for the meal. Fame is important, but to be rich is more important.
quotes.name: Gene Simmons

quotes.message: That equals to being a fool, having fame and no fortune. A lot of guys out there have fame doing this and doing that, but they are broke.
quotes.name: Mike Tyson

quotes.message: Fame is like the dessert that comes with your achievements - it's not an achievement in itself, but sometimes it can overpower the work.
quotes.name: Adam Clayton

quotes.message: Fame is like caviar, you know - it's good to have caviar but not when you have it at every meal.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: Fame and fortune should never get in front of your passion. The passion will generate the fame and fortune, if you're good enough.
quotes.name: Max Walker

quotes.message: All fame is is having people you don't know coming up to you and saying, 'Hello.' I'm always polite and people are always nice, but it's weird.
quotes.name: Karl Pilkington

quotes.message: Fame and fortune are as hard to find as a lightning strike.
quotes.name: P. N. Elrod

quotes.message: Fame is an unnatural construct and those who go in search of it are the least likely to find it.
quotes.name: Ryan Adams

quotes.message: Fame doesn't end loneliness.
quotes.name: Claire Danes

quotes.message: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.
quotes.name: Eminem

quotes.message: Fame is a series of misunderstandings surrounding a name.
quotes.name: Joni Mitchell

quotes.message: Fame is easy to acquire; impact is much more difficult.
quotes.name: Hans Rosling

quotes.message: Fame comes and goes. Longevity is the thing to aim for.
quotes.name: Tony Bennett

quotes.message: What is fame? The advantage of being known by people of whom you yourself know nothing, and for whom you care as little.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: Fame is like a river, that beareth up things light and swollen, and drowns things weighty and solid.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Fame doesn't fulfill you. It warms you a bit, but that warmth is temporary.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: It is in vain to try and stop a star from rising, even with a ladder.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: Fame and insecurity don’t usually mix well. Though the fame maybe easily attainable, acceptance by the masses to one’s satisfaction, usually isn’t.
quotes.name: Robert Black

quotes.message: Fame is neither something to value nor to view as a threat.
quotes.name: Adrienne Posey

quotes.message: The talent of success is nothing more than doing what you can do well; and doing well whatever you do, without a thought of fame.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Fame is the perfume of heroic deeds.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Fame is a fickle food upon a shifting plate.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Fame is no sure test of merit, but only a probability of such; it is an accident, not a property of man.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Fame sometimes hath created something of nothing.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Toil, says the proverb, is the sire of fame.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Even the best things are not equal to their fame.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: I trust a good deal to common fame, as we all must.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: There's not a thing on earth that I can name, so foolish, and so false, as common fame.
quotes.name: John Wilmot

quotes.message: Fondness for fame is avarice of air.
quotes.name: Edward Young

quotes.message: Some to the fascination of a name surrender judgment, hoodwinked.
quotes.name: William Cowper

quotes.message: What a heavy burden is a name that has too soon become famous.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: If I'm such a legend, why am I so lonely?
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: All is temporary and ephemeral—fame and the famous, as well.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Famous men have the whole earth as their memorial.
quotes.name: Pericles

quotes.message: The way to fame is like the way to heaven, through much tribulation.
quotes.name: Laurence Sterne

quotes.message: Fame and honor sometimes fall more fitly on those who do not desire them.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Even for the wise, the desire for glory is the last of all passions to be laid aside.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: If you would acquire fame, let not the sun shine on you in bed.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Fame and repute follow a man to the door.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Consider not death but the fame that will survive you.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: What is fame?—The advantage of being known by people of whom you yourself know nothing, and for whom you care as little.
quotes.name: Leszezynski Stanislaus

quotes.message: There is not in the world so toilsome a trade as the pursuit of fame: life concludes before you have so much as sketched your work.
quotes.name: Jean de La Bruyère

quotes.message: He that pursues fame with just claims, trusts his happiness to the winds; but he that endeavors after it by false merit, has to fear, not only the violence of the storm, but the leaks of his vessel.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The temple of fame stands upon the grave; the flame upon its altars is kindled from the ashes of the dead.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: It often happens that those of whom we speak least on earth are best known in heaven.
quotes.name: Nicolas Caussin

quotes.message: Name, and not fame is the exact yardstick because fame is transitory, and in our times, fame is vulgar because it can actually be bought.
quotes.name: Sandeep Balakrishna
